```{r}
library(plotly)
library(tidyverse)

chick_plot <- ggplot(data = ChickWeight, mapping = aes(x = weight, y = Diet, text = weight)) +
  geom_point(alpha=0.5) +
  labs(title="Diet and Weight of Chicks",
       x="Weight of Chick (in grams)",
       y="Diet")

ggplotly(chick_plot, tooltip = "text")
```
